name: CMIOExtensionProviderSource
desc: A protocol for objects that act as provider sources.

items.name: func connect(to: CMIOExtensionClient)
items.desc: Connects a client to a source’s provider.

items.name: func disconnect(from: CMIOExtensionClient)
items.desc: Disconnects a client from a source’s provider.

items.name: var availableProperties: Set<CMIOExtensionProperty>
items.desc: A set of available properties for a provider.

items.name: func providerProperties(forProperties: Set<CMIOExtensionProperty>) -> CMIOExtensionProviderProperties
items.desc: Gets the state of provider properties.

items.name: func setProviderProperties(CMIOExtensionProviderProperties)
items.desc: Set the state of provider properties.
